title: KRCL Recruitment 2025 -Walk-in interview for 28 Keyman Posts
description: The Konkan Railway Corporation Limited (KRCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 28 Keyman Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date os application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the KRCL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary...
